name: quaking aspen wrap
notes:
materials
- 1 of purl soho’s [linen quill minis][1] 20-color bundle, 50% highland wool, 35% alpaca, and 15% linen. each bundle of this fingering-weight yarn is approximately 2,180 yards/ 500 grams; approximately 1890 total yards required. we used the beach walk bundle.
- us 3 (3.25 mm), 40-inch [circular knitting needles][2]
- a small [crochet hook][3] (for fringe)

gauge
24 stitches and 48 rows (24 ridges) = 4 inches in garter stitch

size
finished dimensions: approximately 19½ inches wide x 70 inches long, omitting fringe

note: this wrap is worked lengthwise, so the width listed above corresponds to the number of rows, and the length corresponds with the cast-on edge.

designed by purl soho designer, [gianna mueller][4]. see more of gianna’s designs [on her instagram][5]!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/linen-quill-minis.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=23796
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=23805
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/
  [5]: https://www.instagram.com/giannaknits/
